original_text: Paul, Silas and Timothy travelled through many towns. In each place, they told the believers the things that the apostles and the other leaders in Jerusalem had decided. They told the believers to obey those rules.
korean_text: 여러 성으로 다녀 갈 때에 예루살렘에 있는 사도와 장로들이 작정한 규례를 그들에게 주어 지키게 하니

sentences.original_text: Paul, Silas and Timothy travelled through many towns.
sentences.korean_translation: 바울, 실라와 디모데는 많은 고을을 다녔습니다.

sentences.original_text: In each place, they told the believers
the things that the apostles and the other leaders
They told the believers to obey those rules.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 신자들에게 그 규칙들을 따르라고 말했습니다.
